item.title: Deploying Wordpress to Pagodabox
item.description: Services such as Heroku provide cloud deployment options for Rails, Sinatra, Django, and Node.js applications, but what about Wordpress? Pagodabox seems promising. Here’s how to set up a Wordpress Pagodabox deployment workflow. Note that these instructions are purposefully verbose in an effort to help those for whom such a workflow may be new and intimidating. Also note that these instructions assume you’re using a Mac. Set up a local instance of Wordpress using MAMP There’s probably a fun way to do this with Vagrant, but MAMP will serve our purposes here.
